titleStmt.title: Jojo's Bizzare Adventure: Steel Ball Run: Chapter 25
titleStmt.author: Hirohiko Araki

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Don't ever speak to me ever again-ever
cbml:panel.desc: Gyro Zeppeli is in the corner saying something

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: In 1191 A.D., 5 meters under the yard of Galstonbury Monastry, in Southwest Europe...
An 'Old Map' written on parchment was discovered.
cbml:panel.desc: Two archaeologists find a treasure chest.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: It was a relic of 'Joseph of Arimathea' In the chest is the 'Old Map.'
'Joseph of Arimathea' was the Saint, who, during the era of the Roman Empire.
Brought the dead body of Jesus Christ down from the cross after he was crucified on the hill of Golgotha..
..And who cleaned the body before its burial.
cbml:panel.desc: Jesus is taken off the cross by Joseph. Joseph and Jesus's mother, Mary, holds him. Mary give him a kiss on the head.

head.desc: Johnny and Gyro lay in the desert. A skeleton of a dinosaur is right behind them.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: Joseph of Arimathea became a missionary and went on many journeys.
He founded the oldest Christian Monastery, Glastonbury, on the island of Britain, and died there.
cbml:panel.desc: Joesph looks out to the ocean.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: 'The Map of Joseph of Arimathea'...
cbml:panel.desc: A portrait of Joseph is seen. It overlaps in the first panel

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But nobody could understand the 'map'.
Nobody had ever seen shores with the 'shape' of those drawn on it.
A place that nobody hav ever seen...
A place that nobody knew...
cbml:panel.desc: Full view of the 'shape' Joseph drew

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: What was the purpose of 'Saint Joseph' drawing this map in the time of Jesus...?
Eventually, the 'map' began to fade from the people's minds...
cbml:panel.desc: Joseph stands in front of a picture frame. The picture is of a beautiful lady.
Closer view of the map Jospeh drew.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: But suddenly...
1500 years later, in the 16th century, the 'map' was stolen and fell into unknown hands. It disappeared from the Land of Glastonbury.
cbml:panel.desc: A shady figure is walking away from the Monastery in Glastonbury..

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: It was a few years after the New World, 'America,' had been discovered.
cbml:panel.sound: stomp The comic uses the Kanji for stomp
cbml:panel.cbml:caption: And now, in 1890 25km to 'Monument Valley'
cbml:panel.desc: A view of Earth from Space
Gyro leads as Johnny rides close behind. A third person is slowly cathing up.
The feet of the three horses stomping quickly.
Johnny looks over the third person approaching. He wears a nervous and frusrated look.

cbml:balloon.said: That guy's horse must be on steroids!
It's 25km to the goal! He either has some crazy technique, or He's just doping otherwise, he woudn't be able to challenge us at this point...
He must be doping! I just decided that he is. What was it? That guy's name behind us??

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro looks frusturated.

cbml:balloon.said: He's German and he plaved 7th in the 1st stage! Let's let him pass us, Gyro!
Our horses' pulses have gone up to 220 per minute! If we force our horses to run at their top speed here, they won't las until the goal!

cbml:panel.desc: Stroheim has a monical. He looks with a neutral expression.

cbml:balloon.said: No, Johnny don't let him get close! We can't let any stranger near us!
The course to the left is my Valkyrie's favorite type of land! We'll let him crush himself there!

cbml:panel.desc: Gyro and Johnny start to go left while Stroheim follows.
Stroheim looks menacingly at them
Stroheim looks more menacingly as shadow cover his face. He holds out his arm that looks like a gun.
Johnny looks behind.

cbml:balloon.said: Gyro, He pulled out a gun!

cbml:panel.desc: Strohiem points his gun at Gyro
Gyro flips himself around about to throw one of his balls.
Gyro gets shoot in the side of his stomach
Close up on Gyro's eye.
Gyro starts to fall off of his horse
Johnny looks in shock
Strohiem shoots more as Johnny tries to duck.
Gyro falls off his horse. He rolls a bit as the rest of them keep running.
